column4: HEY GUYS ! is there any way to watch World Cup Online ? (I am NOT in the UK)
can u give me a site which I can see the openning of the world cup games?
we deal with ubuntu support releated questions here, you should probably ask in #ubuntu-offtopic
I tried to ask a ubuntu question...but nobody replied me
I asked ppl how to setup my TV Tuner
maybe noone knew about tv tuners, have you looked in ubuntu forums?
yeah I have posted in the forums
and only 4 ppl VIEWED my post
is the tuner card in the machine?
ok, install tvtime 'sudo aptitude install tvtime'
oh, the only tv cards I ever used worked out of the box
